languages.text: "По преданиям, носителей этих имен ждало великое будущее. Каждый Маттис и каждая Нааки Эрэбис возвеличивали клан. Становились незаменимыми помощниками Лорд-капитанов. Но предания на то и предания. Не имена дают людям силу, а вера, наполняющая их сердца".

traits.locale_text: "По преданиям, носителей этих имен ждало великое будущее. И так оно и было — каждый Маттис и каждая Нааки Эрэбис возвеличивали клан. Становились незаменимыми помощниками Лорд-капитанов, лучшими абордажниками. Но предания на то и предания. Не имена дают людям силу, а вера, наполняющая их сердца".

languages.text: "Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."
languages.original_text: "По преданиям, носителей этих имен ждало великое будущее. Каждый Маттис и каждая Нааки Эрэбис возвеличивали клан. Становились незаменимыми помощниками Лорд-капитанов. Но предания на то и предания. Не имена дают людям силу, а вера, наполняющая их сердца".

traits.locale_text: "Legends said a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis and every Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's greatness. They would become indispensable assistants to Lords Captain. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

"Legends said a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis and every Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's greatness. They would become indispensable assistants to Lords Captain. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

"Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

"Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

"Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

"Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

languages.text: « D'après la légende, ceux qui portent ces noms ont toujours un destin exceptionnel. Tous les Mattis ou Naaki Erebis qui ont vu le jour ont grandement contribué à la renommée de notre clan et ont toujours servi fidèlement leur {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais, encore une fois, ce ne sont que des légendes. Les gens ne tirent pas leur force de leur nom, mais de la foi qui anime leur cœur. »
languages.original_text: "Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

traits.locale_text: « D'après la légende, ceux qui portent ces noms ont toujours un destin exceptionnel. Tous les Mattis ou Naaki Erebis qui ont vu le jour ont grandement contribué à la renommée de notre clan et ont toujours servi fidèlement leur {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais, encore une fois, ce ne sont que des légendes. Les gens ne tirent pas leur force de leur nom, mais de la foi qui anime leur cœur. »

languages.text: «La leyenda dice que un gran futuro espera a quienes lleven esos nombres. Cada Mattis y cada Naaki Erebis contribuye a la grandeza del clan y sirve fielmente a su Lord Capitán. Pero las leyendas son eso, leyendas. No es el nombre lo que da fuerza a una persona, sino la fe de su corazón».
languages.original_text: "Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

traits.locale_text: «La leyenda dice que un gran futuro espera a quienes lleven esos nombres. Cada Mattis y cada Naaki Erebis contribuye a la grandeza del clan y sirve fielmente a su Lord Capitán. Pero las leyendas son eso, leyendas. No es el nombre lo que da fuerza a una persona, sino la fe de su corazón».

languages.text: 「その名を持つ者には偉大な未来が待つという言い伝えがありました。マティスやナアキ・エレビスは一族の名声を高め、仕えるロード・キャプテンの忠実な助っ人となります。しかし、言い伝えはあくまで言い伝えです。人々に力を与えるのは名前ではなく、その者達の心の中にある信仰なのですから」
languages.original_text: "Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

traits.locale_text: 「その名を持つ者には偉大な未来が待つという言い伝えがありました。マティスやナアキ・エレビスは一族の名声を高め、仕えるロード・キャプテンの忠実な助っ人となります。しかし、言い伝えはあくまで言い伝えです。人々に力を与えるのは名前ではなく、その者達の心の中にある信仰なのですから」

languages.text: “根据传说记载，以这两个名字命名的孩子都会拥有光辉美好的未来。每个起名叫‘马蒂斯’或‘拿基’的人，都会为伊雷比斯氏族增光添彩，他们也会成为领主舰长手下忠心耿耿的助手。不过，传说也仅仅是传说而已，能给人力量的并不是名字，而是人们心里的信念。”
languages.original_text: "Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

traits.locale_text: “根据传说记载，以这两个名字命名的孩子都会拥有光辉美好的未来。每个起名叫‘马蒂斯’或‘拿基’的人，都会为伊雷比斯氏族增光添彩，他们也会成为领主舰长手下忠心耿耿的助手。不过，传说也仅仅是传说而已，能给人力量的并不是名字，而是人们心里的信念。”

languages.text: "Der Legende nach erwartete Träger dieser Namen eine große Zukunft. Alle Mattis oder Naaki Erebis stärkten den Ruf des Clans und erwiesen sich als treue Assistenten jedes Lord Captain, dem sie dienten. Aber Legenden sind und bleiben nur Legenden. Nicht Namen geben Leuten Stärke, sondern der Glaube in ihren Herzen."
languages.original_text: "Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Der Legende nach erwartete Träger dieser Namen eine große Zukunft. Alle Mattis oder Naaki Erebis stärkten den Ruf des Clans und erwiesen sich als treue Assistenten jedes Lord Captain, dem sie dienten. Aber Legenden sind und bleiben nur Legenden. Nicht Namen geben Leuten Stärke, sondern der Glaube in ihren Herzen."

languages.text: "Efsaneye göre bu isimleri taşıyanları muazzam birer gelecek bekler. Her bir Mattis ya da Naaki Erebis, klanın şanına şan katacak ve hizmet ettikleri tüm Lord Kaptanların sadık yardımcıları olacaktır. Ancak efsaneler, adı üzerine efsanelerden ibarettir. İnsanlara kuvvet veren isimler değil, yüreklerindeki inançtır."
languages.original_text: "Legend had it that a great future awaited bearers of those names. Every Mattis or Naaki Erebis would add to the clan's renown, and they would prove faithful assistants to any Lord Captain they served. But legends are just that, legends. It is not names that give people strength but the faith inside their hearts."
